data.eml:eml: A new species of Globicornis Latreille (Coleoptera: Dermestidae) from Baltic amber, with a key to fossil species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bukejs, Andris, Háva, Jiří (2018): A new species of Globicornis Latreille (Coleoptera: Dermestidae) from Baltic amber, with a key to fossil species. Zootaxa 4483 (2): 395-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4483.2.11
